title: Looking for a couple more players for a ranked team
body:
Hey guys my IGN is pezzy I'm a silver player looking to start a ranked team in the silver to gold range
if you're interested post fill out the following and ill get back to you. If we get good enough id love to join a tournament on Battlefly http://battlefy.com/ward-up

PLEASE DO NOT JUST ADD ME AND NOT SAY ANYTHING
Skype is nessassary
Need a couple more players and then we can start getting ready
Support would be preferable

IGN:

Skype:

Age:

Main Role:

Main Champion:

How often you're on:

Rank:

Why you want to play for my team:

replies.body:
IGN: Noobasaurus
 
 Skype:
 
 Age:28
 
 Main Role: Jungle
 
 Main Champion: Sion, Nunu 
 
 How often you on: Every day.
 
 Rank: Silver 3 
 
 Why you want to play for my team: I've come from Dota to LOL, been playing for about 6 months and it's about time to find a team. 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=noobasaurus

IGN: GOA Yeahman

Skype: 

Age: 20

Main Role: adc

Main Champion: legit all but i focus Jinx and kalista

How often you're on: motly all day and nights from 9-4am

Rank: d5

Why you want to play for my team: just wanna give playing for a team a go
I was gold 2 last season and gold 3 100 points this season,,, what divisions you guys are ? silver 1 or 2 or 3?
the team ranges from like silver 5 to gold 1 so you'd be welcomed we are still getting positions and stuff sorted so there is still space for you
